Childhood.Title: punk
Childhood.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.

Adulthood.Title: game developer
Adulthood.BaseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, [PAWN_possessive] career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.
